channel.title: Excessive Flickering
channel.description: I am having excessive flickering when I repaint my canvas. It has only three images on it (one of which is the background, being around 500x500) and a few drawn Strings. I am using a Buffer Strategy and have tried manual double buffering, but it still flickers horribly. I have had this problem in the past but fixed it with double buffering. Does anyone know how I can fix it?

item.title: Excessive Flickering
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Okay, now only the game loop repaints the method. However, my new issue is that the loop is not going fast enough (right now it goes around 4-6 fps and it should be going around 20.) I guess I will just mess around with it some more and debug it to find the poor timing spots. Thanks for your help again, Iamadam.

Edit: Nvm, found out that the pngs I save from Photoshop were absolutely huge and slowed down the loop by 250 ms. It is perfect now, thanks again everyone.
